verses.text: Again in the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w* thee the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add even\add* of this \w same|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w set|strong="H5564"\w* himself against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* this \w same|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And \w utter|strong="H4911"\w* a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* unto the \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Set \w on|strong="H8239"\w* a \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*, set \add it\add* \w on|strong="H8239"\w*, and also \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* into it:

\w Gather|strong="H0622"\w* the \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w* thereof into it, \add even\add* every \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w*, the \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, and the \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w*; \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \add it\add* with the \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H1754"\w* also the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* under it, \add and\add* make it \w boil|strong="H7570"\w* \w well|strong="H7571"\w*, and let them \w seethe|strong="H1310"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of it \w therein|strong="H8432"\w*.\f + \fr 24.5 \ft burn: or, heap\f*

¶ Wherefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* to the \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, to the \w pot|strong="H5518"\w* whose \w scum|strong="H2457"\w* \add is\add* therein, and whose \w scum|strong="H2457"\w* is not gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of it! bring it \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w piece|strong="H5409"\w* by \w piece|strong="H5409"\w*; let no \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon it.

For her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* is in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of her; she \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it upon the \w top|strong="H6706"\w* of a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*; she \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* it not upon the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* it with \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*;

That it might cause \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w take|strong="H5358"\w* \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w*; I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w top|strong="H6706"\w* of a \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, that it should not be \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Woe|strong="H0188"\w* to the \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*! I will even make the \w pile|strong="H4071"\w* for fire \w great|strong="H1431"\w*.

\w Heap|strong="H7235"\w* on \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*, \w kindle|strong="H1814"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \w consume|strong="H8552"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w spice|strong="H7543"\w* it \w well|strong="H4841"\w*, and let the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* be \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*.

Then \w set|strong="H5975"\w* it \w empty|strong="H7386"\w* upon the \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* thereof, that the \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* of it may be \w hot|strong="H3179"\w*, and may \w burn|strong="H2787"\w*, and \add that\add* the \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* of it may be \w molten|strong="H5413"\w* in \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, \add that\add* the \w scum|strong="H2457"\w* of it may be \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*.

She hath \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* \add herself\add* with \w lies|strong="H8383"\w*, and her \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w scum|strong="H2457"\w* went not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of her: her \w scum|strong="H2457"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

In thy \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* \add is\add* \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w*: because I have \w purged|strong="H2891"\w* thee, and thou wast not \w purged|strong="H2891"\w*, thou shalt not be \w purged|strong="H2891"\w* from thy \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* any more, till I have caused my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* upon thee.

I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it:\add* it shall come to \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, and I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add it;\add* I will not go \w back|strong="H6544"\w*, neither will I \w spare|strong="H2347"\w*, neither will I \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*; according to thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and according to thy \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*, shall they \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.
¶ Also the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, behold, I take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* from thee the \w desire|strong="H4261"\w* of thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* with a \w stroke|strong="H4046"\w*: yet neither shalt thou \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* nor \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*, neither shall thy \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* run \w down|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 24.16 \ft run down: Heb. go\f*

\w Forbear|strong="H1826"\w* to \w cry|strong="H0602"\w*, \w make|strong="H6213"\w* no \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w* for the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w bind|strong="H2280"\w* the tire of thine \w head|strong="H6287"\w* upon thee, and put \w on|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* upon thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* not \add thy\add* \w lips|strong="H8222"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* not the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.\f + \fr 24.17 \ft Forbear: Heb. Be silent\f*\f + \fr 24.17 \ft lips: Heb. upper lip\f*

So I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: and at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* my \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*; and I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* as I was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

¶ And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Wilt thou not \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* us what these \add things are\add* to us, that thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* \add so\add*?
Then I \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* them, The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* my \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, the \w excellency|strong="H1347"\w* of your \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, the \w desire|strong="H4261"\w* of your \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and that which your \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w pitieth|strong="H4263"\w*; and your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* whom ye have \w left|strong="H5800"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 24.21 \ft that…: Heb. the pity of your soul\f*

And ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* as I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: ye shall not \w cover|strong="H5844"\w* \add your\add* \w lips|strong="H8222"\w*, nor \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

And your \w tires|strong="H6287"\w* \add shall be\add* upon your \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, and your \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w* upon your \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: ye shall not \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w* nor \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*; but ye shall pine \w away|strong="H4743"\w* for your \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w mourn|strong="H5098"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* toward \w another|strong="H0251"\w*.

Thus \w Ezekiel|strong="H3168"\w* is unto you a \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*: according to all that he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: and when this \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

Also, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \add shall it\add* not \add be\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when I \w take|strong="H3947"\w* from them their \w strength|strong="H4581"\w*, the \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of their \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*, the \w desire|strong="H4261"\w* of their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and that whereupon they \w set|strong="H4853"\w* their \w minds|strong="H5315"\w*, their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*,\f + \fr 24.25 \ft that…: Heb. the lifting up of their soul\f*

\add That\add* he that \w escapeth|strong="H6412"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee, to cause \add thee\add* to \w hear|strong="H2045"\w* \add it\add* with \add thine\add* \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*?

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* to him which is \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w*, and thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and be no more \w dumb|strong="H0481"\w*: and thou shalt be a \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* unto them; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
